summary: This video provides a step-by-step guide on creating a new Salesforce developer account and installing the Salesforce CPQ package. It covers the necessary steps for account creation, package installation, and initial configuration required for effective use of Salesforce CPQ.

keyPoints.text: Creating a new Salesforce developer account
Installing the Salesforce CPQ package from the provided URL
Understanding the relationship between products and price books in Salesforce
Configuring CPQ layouts and profiles for effective usage
Verifying successful installation of the CPQ package
